QuestData.Title: Rotting Hearts
QuestData.Description: I hear the Amani trolls eat their enemies' hearts to steal their strength. They might just be on to something, $n. With the proper treatment, the hearts of the unliving can produce potent elixirs.$B$BHunt down the zombies that roam the Dead Scar and bring me their hearts. I'll show you the kind of enhancement we can perform to your physical prowess against the undead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring back 10 Rotting Hearts to Magistrix Aminel in Tranquillien.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the zombie hearts I requested, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: Take this draught, $N. After you drink it, your physical strength against the Scourge will receive a boost. If you need more than this sample bring me more hearts.
